posts.post_content: This is just a stupid idea for a card. Consider that a giant growth gives you +3/+3 for only 1 mana. That makes this card WAY overpriced. posts.post_content:
The fixed [Berserk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Berserk)!  
Remember that Berserk was considered too powerful in the early days. Ice Age block represented something of a low in creature power level; the subsequent Mirage and Tempest blocks introduced more potent creatures (e.g. Vision's [Stampeding Wildebeests](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stampeding Wildebeests)) and pump spells (e.g. [Overrun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overrun)).

posts.post_content: This card was obviously an attempt to make a "fixed" Berserk, which turned out to be rather useless.
